Table.name: SMSM
Table.sql: SELECT * FROM SMSM A WHERE A.U_ID=':=uid'

Table.name: SMSMPT
Table.sql: SELECT B.*, (SELECT TOP (1) PART_ADDR1 FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPART_ADDR1, (SELECT TOP (1) PART_ADDR2 FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPART_ADDR2, (SELECT TOP (1) PART_ADDR3 FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPART_ADDR3, (SELECT TOP (1) PART_ADDR4 FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPART_ADDR4, (SELECT TOP (1) PART_ADDR5 FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPART_ADDR5, (SELECT TOP (1) PARTY_NAME FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPARTY_NAME, (SELECT TOP (1) PARTY_NAME2 FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPARTY_NAME2, (SELECT TOP (1) PARTY_NAME3 FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPARTY_NAME3, (SELECT TOP (1) PARTY_NAME4 FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS SMPARTY_NAME4, (SELECT TOP (1) IM_RECORD FROM SMPTY WHERE PARTY_NO=B.PARTY_NO) AS IM_RECORD FROM SMSMPT B,SMSM A WHERE A.U_ID=B.U_FID AND A.U_ID=':=uid'

Table.name: SMDNP
Table.sql: SELECT B.* FROM SMDNP B,SMDN A WHERE B.U_FID=A.U_ID AND A.SHIPMENT_ID=':=shipid'

Table.name: SMRV
Table.sql: SELECT * FROM SMRV A WHERE A.SHIPMENT_ID=':=shipid'

Table.name: SMSIM
Table.sql: SELECT B.*FROM SMSIM B, SMSM A WHERE B.PROFILE=A.PROFILE_CD AND A.SHIPMENT_ID=':=shipid'
